page.title: 05RECREATION IN ORPINGTON
page.content: To meet the recreational needs of the people of {Orpington}, the {Walnuts Sports Centre} was built. The facilities it offers include a swimming pool,squash courts, gymnasium, snooker room, two sports halls for badminton, basketball and indoor hockey, plus a bar and cafeteria. The centre has also been used to hold national sporting events and people who live over 10 miles away from Orpington come to use its facilities. There is a strong feeling that there is very little for the {youth of Orpington} to do in the evenings. The local {cinema} has closed and there are very few {youth club}s or {activity centres} which young people can use. This has led to an increase of visible {vandalism} and graffiti around the town itself.
